name: Acquisition of lands
text: [§277-3]  Acquisition of lands.  The director of transportation in the name of the State and subject to the approval of the governor may for the purposes of this chapter acquire, by purchase or eminent domain, private property in fee simple, or any lesser interest therein, including leases, all property necessary for the establishment, maintenance, operation, management and control of energy corridors. [L 1970, c 33, §3]
